의미 확장(현재 쓰임 포함): 환경, 에너지, 문화재 보호 문맥에서 사용
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) We must conserve water during the drought. 2) The museum conserves ancient artifacts. 3) Conserving energy is important for sustainability.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'conserve' 의미? (A) 낭비하다 (B) 보존하다 (C) 제거하다 → B; Q2: 명사형은? (A) conservation (B) conserveion → A; Q3: collocation 예? → conserve energy

의미 확장(현재 쓰임 포함): 환경, 역사, 예술품 등 유지·보호 문맥에서 사용
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Preservation of historical sites is crucial. 2) Food preservation techniques extend shelf life. 3) The preservation of biodiversity is essential.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'preservation' 품사? (A) 명사 (B) 동사 → A; Q2: 의미? (A) 파괴 (B) 보존 → B; Q3: collocation 예? → preservation of species

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): a sense of contentment, personal contentment
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) She felt a deep sense of contentment. 2) Contentment is more valuable than wealth. 3) He found contentment in simple living.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'contentment' 의미? (A) 불만 (B) 만족 → B; Q2: 유사어? (A) dissatisfaction (B) happiness → B; Q3: 표현 예? → a sense of contentment

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): accuse someone of theft, falsely accused
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) He was accused of stealing the money. 2) The politician was accused of corruption. 3) She accused him of lying.
학습 팁: charge, blame와 비교하여 법적 문맥 구분
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'accuse' 의미? (A) 칭찬 (B) 고발/비난 → B; Q2: accuse 다음 올 전치사는? (A) of (B) for → A; Q3: 명사형은? (A) accusation → A

핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 문법 단위로의 문장 또는 법적 형벌을 내림.
의미 확장(현재 쓰임 포함): 법률 문맥에서 형벌 의미, 문법 문맥에서 문장 의미
콜로케이션(뜻 포함): death sentence, sentence someone to prison
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The judge sentenced him to five years. 2) She wrote a long sentence. 3) He received a harsh sentence for the crime.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'sentence' 의미? (A) 문장 (B) 형벌 (C) 둘 다 → C; Q2: 형벌 의미 시 타동사? (A) O → 맞음; Q3: collocation 예? → sentence someone to prison

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): scores of people, scores of books
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Scores of people attended the concert. 2) There are scores of reasons to be cautious. 3) Scores of books lined the shelves.
학습 팁: dozens of와 비교하여 수량 표현 기억
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'scores of' 의미? (A) 소수 (B) 다수 → B; Q2: 유사 표현? (A) dozens of → A; Q3: 사용 가능한 품사? → 명사 앞 수량 표현

예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) The old house was demolished. 2) He demolished the argument with evidence. 3) They plan to demolish the bridge.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'demolish' 의미? (A) 건설 (B) 파괴 → B; Q2: 명사형? (A) demolition → A; Q3: collocation 예? → demolish a building

핵심 개념 요약(한 문장): 환경·자원·경제 등이 오래 유지될 수 있음.
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) Sustainable practices help preserve the planet. 2) The project is sustainable long-term. 3) Farmers adopt sustainable methods.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'sustainable' 의미? (A) 지속 가능한 → A; Q2: 반의어? (A) unsustainable → A; Q3: collocation 예? → sustainable development

의미 확장(현재 쓰임 포함): 환경, 경제, 심리적 상태 등 유지 의미
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) He could not sustain the effort. 2) The building sustains heavy loads. 3) Policies must sustain economic growth.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'sustain' 의미? (A) 버리다 (B) 유지하다 → B; Q2: 명사형? (A) sustenance (B) sustainability → 둘 다; Q3: collocation 예? → sustain life

콜로케이션(뜻 포함): resolve a conflict, resolve to succeed
예문(난이도별 2~3개): 1) She resolved to improve her grades. 2) The company resolved the dispute amicably. 3) He showed great resolve in completing the task.
미니 퀴즈(3문항 선택형): Q1: 'resolve' 의미? (A) 무시하다 (B) 해결/결심 → B; Q2: 명사형? (A) resolution → A; Q3: collocation 예? → resolve a conflict
